howToUse.body1: Paste the YouTube link into the search box.
howToUse.body2: Click on the Download video button or the Download audio button.
howToUse.body3: Finally, wait for the download to complete.

errors.urlNotValid: The value entered isn't a valid URL
errors.couldNotBeDownloaded: An error occurred while downloading the video/audio, please try again later, if the problem persists please contact me.

download.info: Video / audio saved on your desktop

share.error: Oops! A problem occurred while trying to copy the URL to the clipboard. Please try again later.

shareAPI.text: The best website for downloading videos/audios from YouTube

modal.text: There's an English version available, do you wanna go to the English version?

validations.os: Sorry, video and audio downloads aren't available on Android and iOS devices.
